body.name: JVC 32-Inch 720p HD LED Roku Smart TV with Voice Control App, Airplay, Screen Casting, & 300+ Free Streaming Channels (LT32MAW2)
features: A Revolution in Resolution - The JVC 32'' Class Direct LED ROKU HD Smart TV has an amazingly pristine image with a resolution of 1366 x 768 that produces a vivid and brilliant pictures. Enjoy the ultimate in entertainment with a stunningly defined picture that will leave your eyes in awe. High definition picture resolution is the future and JVC delivers it right to your home.

ROKU Integrated Advantages - One remote to control it all. Enjoy instant access to the best selection of apps from top-tier streaming services like Netflix, Disney+, YouTube, and many more right on the TV. Having Roku integrated allows you use your JVC TV remote to control all your Roku streaming features and services instead of having to use two separate remotes.

Rich History of Sound & Video - Founded in 1927, JVC became famous for introducing Japan's very first television in 1939 and for developing the Video Home System (VHS) video recorder in 1976. For close to a century JVC has been leading innovations in audio and video, culminating in our Roku Smart TV’s.

Featured - Means you're one click away from hundreds of movies, TV episodes, and live news from channels like The Roku Channel, ABC, CW, and more. And you can use the Roku mobile app for iOS or Android devices to search by voice, cast personal media or video, and control your TV.

Multiple Inputs and Outputs - Connect your home theater components such as a Blu-ray player, game console, speakers, cable/antenna and more. TV connections include 3 HDMI ports, composite (AV) jacks, digital optical output, USB port, headphone jack, coaxial jack and Wi-Fi technology.
body.description: AirPlay lets you do it all Effortlessly share videos, photos, music, and more from your Apple device to your TV using AirPlay. Plus mirror the screen from your iPhone, iPad, or Mac to the big screen. Now available on most Roku devices!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: JVC High Definition Smart TV with Roku More than a Smart TV—a better TV The JVC 32" Class 720p Roku Smart TV offers an amazingly pristine image with a resolution of 1366x768. Enjoy the ultimate in entertainment with a defined picture that will leave any viewer in awe. High quality picture is the future and JVC delivers it to your home. It is more than a smart TV - it's a better TV. It features a direct LED panel and sports three HDMI inputs for digital HD sources like cable/satellite boxes and gaming consoles, plus a USB input to view pictures, videos and pause live TV. A composite video input lets you connect legacy devices, like a VCR. All of your entertainment is in one place with access to over 500,000 movies, TV episodes, and more than 5,000 streaming channels. Start streaming your favorite shows, access your cable box or HD antenna, even fire up your gaming console - all from your home screen. With Featured Free on your home screen, you're one click away from hundreds of free movies, TV episodes, and live news from channels like The Roku Channel, ABC, CW and more. Easily search across top channels for results ranked by cost. Use the free Roku mobile app for iOS or Android devices to search by voice, cast personal media or video, and control your TV. Includes JVC 32" HD 720p LED Roku Smart TVJVC Remote ControlJVC TV Feet

Your home for free and premium TV Dive into free TV–The Roku platform has thousands of hours of free entertainment, from 100+ live TV channels with news, sports, and more, to classic movies and kids’ TV. Featured Free and The Roku Channel on your Roku home screen are great places to start. Roku Channel–Your home for free and premium TV. Enjoy an always-changing selection of free movies, shows, live news, kids’ TV, and more. Add Premium Subscriptions to watch it all in one place. Featured Free–Top entertainment. Always free. A handpicked selection of free movies, in-season episodes, and classic favorites from top channels. Featured Free is on the home screen of every Roku player and Roku TV. Roku Originals–Featuring Hollywood’s biggest stars, enjoy free original series including Die Hart, Most Dangerous Game, Dummy, Punk’d, Reno 911!, #FREERAYSHAWN, Royalties, Chrissy’s Court, and many others. Free Live TV–Enjoy instant access to more than 300+ free live TV channels at any time. With live news and weather, sports, food & home, reality TV, science fiction, true crime, kids’ entertainment, and Spanish language content, we have something for everyone. Premium Subscriptions–Stream top paid programming from services like Netflix, Prime Video, Hulu, Apple TV, HBO Max, SHOWTIME, and watch it all in one place.

Works with popular voice assistants Enjoy easy voice control with Siri, Alexa, and Google Assistant. AirPlay lets you do it all Effortlessly share videos, photos, music, and more from your Apple device to your TV using AirPlay. Plus mirror the screen from your iPhone, iPad, or Mac to the big screen. Now available on most Roku devices!

Meet the must-have app for streamers Search in a snap Quickly search across thousands of channels with your voice or keyboard. You'll see where movies and shows are available to stream for free or at the lowest cost. Not sure what to watch? Now you can browse your favorite genres with Roku Zones on the search page. Don't wake the house Feel free to turn up the volume any time with private listening on the Roku mobile app. Just plug headphones into your phone and listen at any volume you want. Plus, up to three friends can join in on their phones too. Free TV on the go Stream The Roku Channel and enjoy hit movies, TV shows, live channels, and more—anytime, anywhere. You can even start watching at home then pick up where you left off on the go. Cast photos and more on your TV Easily share photos, videos, and music from your compatible smartphone or tablet right to your TV. Enjoy fantastic slideshows and videos starring you and your loved ones on the big screen. You and your friends can even share and enjoy photos and videos from your mobile devices at the same time.

Screen Size 31.5" Resolution 1366x768 Aspect Ratio 16:9 Display Technology Direct LED Viewing Angle 160° / 150° Brightness 220 cd/m2 Contrast Ratio 3000:1 Response Time 20ms Refresh Rate 60Hz Virtual Assistant Support Alexa, Apple Siri, Google Assistant Audio Output 8W x 2 Video System NTSC/ATSC TV Tuner Connectivity Dual-Band Wi-Fi, 3x HDMI, 1x USB, 1x Optical Audio, 1x Composite AV, 1x Antenna Input, 1x Headphone Jack VESA Mounting 200mm x 100mm Dimensions (without stand) 28.9 x 17.1 x 3.0" Weight 7.7 lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice TV. Great picture and sound quality. Easy to set up and light as a feather.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was really easy to set up. The picture was brilliant.I was a little apprehensive about setting it up, but itturned out to be much easier than I thought.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Needs improvements to come up to jvc’s past reputation!
reviews.reviewText: Roku is only wifi capable and very unstable signal. Needs to include wired port option. Poorly written instructions. Was a jvc pro and consumer dealer for many years when the company was under different ownership. Very disappointed! Even phone support leaves much to be desired as it’s outsourced with operators having little product knowledge. They rely on computer screen info thus unable to answer many questions directly! Certainly not the JVC I use to know! Very disappointing indeed!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Its great. We have no problems.Its everything it said in the Description. It was well worth the money.. I would buy it again for another bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor Warr Poor Communication. Purchased in March & now it’s June and still lack of response byJVC !
reviews.reviewText: The tv was easy to set up but after three weeks it’s experiencing glitches. The sound goes off and isn’t adjustable with the remote and to recover you need to switch to a different program then switch back in the hopes you didn’t miss to much of what they were saying. Now it’s blanking out and you need to switch programs and then come back to what you were watching. Purchased in March and its Mid May without support! It’s June now and we have not made progress on getting a refund for the tv with audio issues!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality. Highly recommended.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Easy to set up. Loud volume.which I like it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This tv is awesome
reviews.reviewText: I like the old sitcoms and movies on the Roku channel. Color and other settings perfect. No need adjust. would highly recommed. Good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 200 bucks for a brilliant tv no mounting screws!!
reviews.reviewText: High definition tv for sure but WHY SCIMP on. 4 measly metric screws that I HAVE TO FIND????
